Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, east of the Wakarimasu Park.
Room.LongDescription: Ahead, to the north, you can see a grand bridge crossing over a very powerful looking river. The river appears to be flowing into the park. Highland Avenue continues to the north and south, running parallel to the eastern border of the city and the City Walls.
